meanings.sent1: In paleozoology, scientists learn about animals that lived long ago.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use paleozoology to understand how ancient animals behaved.
meanings.sent3: The paleozoology class had a fossil show-and-tell day.
meanings.sent4: Exploring paleozoology is like uncovering a time capsule of animal history.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit on paleozoology brought the ancient creatures to life.

meanings.definition: The branch of zoology that focuses on prehistoric animal life.
meanings.sent1: Paleozoology helps us understand the animals that roamed the Earth long ago.
meanings.sent2: Experts in paleozoology study the remains of prehistoric creatures.
meanings.sent3: The paleozoology department organized a field trip to a dinosaur dig site.
meanings.sent4: Learning about paleozoology is like piecing together a puzzle of ancient fauna.
meanings.sent5: The documentary on paleozoology showcased the diversity of prehistoric animals.
